summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4649 for the improvement of 8th Avenue North from McGraw Street to Halladay Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54047, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
